it's fair to say that Larry Page will not be a conventional CEO- he's not been much of a public figure for the past ten years," John Battelle added on his blog, John Battellemedia.com. It will be interesting to see if that changes, or if Larry Page chafes at the relentless public demands of running a massively scrutinized public company. Eric Schmidt , in a blog post, said: " Larry Page , Sergey Brin and I have been talking for a long time about how best to simplify our management structure and speed up decision making."

that preparation on the upcoming ITV series has ground to a halt, since the futures of Simon Cowell and Cheryl Cole- as well as presenter Dermot O'Leary - are still unclear.
